imgDesc.text: According to the native people of Tsurumi Island, the Thunderbird once perched upon these trees, and thus it is necessary to make offerings to them. Touch the Perch, and the power within it will transform into 3 feathers and fly away. Gather the scattered power to complete the offering process.

According to the native people of Tsurumi Island, the Thunderbird once perched upon these trees, and thus it is necessary to make offerings to them. Touch the Perch, and the power within it will transform into 3 feathers and fly away. Gather the scattered power to complete the offering process.
